scripts.pack-prepare: npm run compile  &&  npm run doc
scripts.pack-win: npm run pack-prepare  &&  electron-builder build --win --publish never
scripts.pack-mac: npm run pack-prepare  &&  electron-builder build --mac --publish never
scripts.pack-linux: npm run pack-prepare  &&  electron-builder build --linux --publish never
scripts.publish-github: npm run pack-prepare  &&  electron-builder build --publish always
scripts.publish-itchio: npm run pack-prepare  &&  butler push "redist/LEd %npm_package_version% installer.exe" deepnight/led:win64 --userversion-file ../lastBuildVersion.txt
